xtiny-doc-page.name: Plugins Menu
xtiny-doc-page.title: Jext : Plugins Menu
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: This menu contains the menu items and sub menus added by installed plugins. However, plugins aren't restricted to this menu alone, they can add their menu items to other menus (as HTMLPlugin and JavaPlugin do: their items show up in the Edit Menu). Plugins can be shown and hidden according to the current syntax colorizing mode selected !

menu.title: Contents
menu.item: This appears only when no items have been added in Plugins Menu. The default Jext distribution includes at least one plugin in this menu: HyperTyper.
